summary: Please don't die computer generated person!
descriptionHtml:
Easy to use and edit batch file.
Inspired by: [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23614/?]No More Redshirts[/url][/b] by [b]Drowchyld777

[/b]Information gathered from [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:People]here[/url] and [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Dragonborn:People]here[/url].

[b]NOTE[/b]: Guards and section "Overworld / Wilderness" were not added. Might add later.

[u]Installation[/u]:

-Put the files in the "Batch Files" folder to your Skyrim folder. If you use Steam: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim
-Check your Load order and make it the same as the one in the "Load Order" file.

[u]How to use[/u]:

-Open the In-game console.
-Write: bat "Name of the file". Ex: bat setessential

[u]Recommendations[/u]:

If you're going to edit the files I recommend using [url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/]Notepad++[/url].

[u]Questions and Answers[/u]:

Q: Are the DLC's needed:
A: I don't think so. I think all the NPC's added by the DLC's will be ignored.

Q: Why is this description total shit?
A: Because reasons.
author: WolfusX
